plot outline: After being overwhelmed by the cheaters who cheat common people day-to-day, Rangayana Raghu { Harishchandra}, decides to write a book in an attempt to reform the corrupted mindsets. The screenplay will twist in the direction of Harishchandra's thoughts influencing and reforming 3 characters involved in underworld activities.
title: Girgitle
plot: A man decides to write a book in an attempt to reduce the cheating of innocent people and bring about a change in corrupted mindsets.

After being overwhelmed by the cheaters who cheat common people day-to-day, Rangayana Raghu { Harishchandra}, decides to write a book in an attempt to reform the corrupted mindsets. The screenplay will twist in the direction of Harishchandra's thoughts influencing and reforming 3 characters involved in underworld activities.::Ravi Kiran
